page.title: 13ACTIVITIES IN GARTMORE
page.content: Gartmore has a wide variety of organisations. The{Playgroup}has about 10 children. They meet in the village hall from 9.30-12.00am on Tuesdays and Thursdays. The{Brownies}have about 12 members and 2 Guiders. They meet in the Village Hall from 4.00-5.15pm on a Monday. They planted 75 daffodil bulbs next to the football pitch for the 75th anniversary of Guiding in 1985. The{Youth Club}meets in the Village Hall on a Friday evening. They have a game called Unihoc which is a plastic hockey set and they also play snooker, or listen to records.{Dance-Fit and {Yoga}classes have about 10 members each. They are for people who want to keep fit, but only one man takes part! The{Woman's Rural Institute}meets once a month in the Village Hall. They run the children's Christmas party and the Old Folk's Christmas Dinner.
